definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
class or grade/generation/plaintiff and defendant (old)/government department (old)

sentences.english: It is said that people will be sent to hell after death.
sentences.chinese: 傳說中，人死後是要被送到陰曹地府的。

sentences.english: After Ghost Month, ghosts have to return to the underworld, and the Gates of Hell close.
sentences.chinese: 鬼月過了，鬼將回到陰曹地府，鬼門也會關上。
